response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $150. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am proposing an exclusive offer of $180. This price reflects the high standard of our product and the value it brings to its users. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 180}
